#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int t,n,k,j,num,*count;

   cin>>t;

   while(t--)
   {

     cin>>n>>k;

     count=(int *)calloc(1000,sizeof(int)) ;

     while(n--)
     {

       cin>>num;

       for(j=999;j>0;j--)
       {

         if(count[j]>0 && j+num<=999)
         count[j+num]++;

       }

       count[num]++;

     }

     if(count[k]!=0) cout<<"1"<<endl;

     else cout<<"0"<<endl;

     free(count);

   }

   return 0;

}
